description: Add a scoped Rebalance workflow for alternating assignment and switch verification logging to a local-only scratchpad workflow.

changes.description: add Rebalance button to rebase counters to selected batch scope and auto-set condition offset (with undo + active-batch guard)
switch verification logging to local-only notes; keep official PASS/FAIL on changelog entries; move dev version source to docs/working-version.json
record PASS for abandoned drafts (local workflow)
